name: Rebit
description: REBIT is a bigdata based global reward platform that combines blockchain, keyboard and AI technologies. Basing on powerful technology developed from 18 years of partnership with Samsung Electronics, and as the world’s first blockchain based keyboard, we intend to expand into data business, digital ads, bigdata solutions, contents distribution and various other industries. User can earn erc20 based Keyboard Token(KEYT) just by using “Cash Board” which is a keyboard solution based on blockchain technology.
